Implemented specific layout structure for dashboard pages with clear visual hierarchy.

Layout Architecture:

1. SidebarProvider wrapper (top level)
2. AppSidebar component (blue, straight edges, no overflow)
3. SidebarInset containing:
   - SiteHeader
   - Main content area with:
     - Background: bg-gray-100 (light gray)
     - Content container: bg-white rounded-3xl with padding

Visual Hierarchy:

- Layer 1: Gray background (bg-gray-100)
- Layer 2: White rounded container on top of gray
- Layer 3: All dashboard content inside white container

Key Learning:
User corrected initial implementation where blue was bleeding into dashboard area. Solution was to:

1. Remove "variant='inset'" from AppSidebar
2. Remove rounded corners from sidebar
3. Keep blue color strictly within sidebar boundaries

File: /src/app/dashboard-vendas/page.tsx
